title: AP invoice import error: taxes not derived
rca: Supplier/site tax configuration incomplete or incorrect; tax regime/rules not matching the invoice's BU, ship-to/bill-to, or line attributes.
prechecks: Confirm BU, ledger, currency on invoice match setup
Verify Supplier Site: Invoicing options → default tax settings present
Check tax regime, tax rules, and determining factors for the country
Validate item/category and ship-to/bill-to locations on lines
steps: Open Supplier Site → Invoicing: set default tax classification / party tax profile
Review Tax Configuration: ensure regime, taxes, statuses, and rates are active
Update tax rules to cover the determining factors used by AP import
Reprocess the invoice through Import Payables Invoices
Verify line-level tax calculated as expected
validation: Invoice imported successfully with taxes derived
Tax distribution generated and accounted without errors

title: GL journal cannot be posted due to sequencing mismatch
rca: Sequencing assignment for Spreadsheet source and Adjustment category not aligned with fiscal year setup; FY 2024/2025 overlap or missing period mapping.
prechecks: Check existing sequencing assignments and their start/end dates
Verify Journal Source = Spreadsheet and Category = Adjustment exist
Confirm ledger → accounting calendar periods and fiscal year boundaries
Ensure no duplicate or overlapping assignments for same source/category
steps: End-date the conflicting sequencing assignment (if overlapping)
Create a new assignment for FY 2024 with Source=Spreadsheet, Category=Adjustment
Set Start Date = 2024-01-01 and End Date = 2024-12-31 (example)
Enable the assignment; clear cache if applicable
validation: Journal posts successfully with the correct sequence number
No further 'sequence mismatch' or 'date not in range' errors

title: Payment Process Request not generating format output
rca: Payment Process Profile not linked to the required disbursement bank account or incorrect payment document/format mapping.
prechecks: Verify PPP assigned to the PPR and to the disbursement bank account
Check Payment Document sequence and active status
Confirm format program and layout template are active and accessible
Review supplier/site payment methods and remit-to account setup
steps: Open Payment Process Profile and set the correct Format Program & Template
Attach PPP to the disbursement bank account used by the PPR
Ensure Payment Document is active and has available numbers
Re-submit the PPR from 'Manage Payment Process Requests'
Validate output file generation in Payments → View Output
validation: Output file is generated and downloadable; payments accounted

title: Dunning letters not generated for certain customers (case 1)
rca: Dunning configuration/strategy assignment does not match customer profile class, delinquency thresholds, or level transitions.
prechecks: Check Dunning Configuration: levels, days overdue, balances, currencies
Verify Customer Profile and Profile Class: dunning enabled, strategy assignment
Confirm transactions are overdue and not on dispute/hold
Review Dunning assignment rules by BU and site
steps: Align configuration thresholds with business policy
Assign correct strategy at Customer/Profile Class/Site
Run 'Generate Dunning Letters' with applicable BU/date
Review log for excluded transactions and correct master data
validation: Dunning letters generated and appear in Transactions > Print Documents
Customers included per strategy level; no unexpected exclusions
